title: Single reservation with manual payment
custom_steps:
GIVEN a fan has an  single reservation order that is PENDING MANUAL PAYMENTS
WHEN the fan logs in MPV
THEN they remain in the MPV Renewals flow
AND they are able to make any payments that are due now, without setting up scheduled payments for future installments
AND IF the order requires an e-signature
  THEN the fan will go through the Adobe Sign flow
AND the fan will be able to successfully checkout
